description: Showing off his acumen in the pool, Campbell Stevens is a former water polo player who is just taking some laps and getting in a quick swim on a beautiful summer afternoon. And what a massive piece of manhood he has! Sitting back down on the couch, he goes at his crotch with reckless abandon, working it up into a frenzy before finally opening the flood gates and exploding in a cum-stained mess all over himself.Enjoy!
title: Campbell Stevens
